snippet: Wakar, an 18-year-old clerk on duty at a meatpacking district gas station, was just following the rules — which led to a testy and ultimately violent dispute with a customer in the early-morning hours.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes chain of events at late-night gas station in Manhattan's meatpacking district that led to a teenage clerk, on the job for only two months, being cut badly in a dispute over a pack of cigarettes.
lead_paragraph: Wakar, an 18-year-old clerk on duty at a meatpacking district gas station, was just following the rules — which led to a testy and ultimately violent dispute with a customer in the early-morning hours.

headline.main: In an Excruciatingly Hip Neighborhood, a Bloody Encounter
headline.print_headline: In an Excruciatingly Hip Neighborhood, a Bloody Encounter
